# gero

𓎡 𓎛 𓎡 𓎛 𓀗 | old | 𒋼𒀀 kar² ghiero : gero γέρων Greis хераб χerab ⇔ great of age
𓎡 𓎛 𓎡 𓎛 𓀗 | old | gero 𒋡𒊏 qa-ra kara @ Elamite
𓎡 𓎛 𓎡 𓎛 𓀘 | become old | GERO duplication ⇔ gebrechlich Krücke

𐀏𐀨𐀸 ka-ra-we γράFες *γραύς >γραία "old women" (Graf Greif Greise?)

𒋼𒀀 kar gero "senior" 𓀘
